Package com.mhealthatlas.enterprisemanagement.config.web

Class KeycloakAuthenticationConverter

java.lang.Object
com.mhealthatlas.enterprisemanagement.config.web.KeycloakAuthenticationConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter<org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt,​java.util.Collection<org.springframework.security.core.GrantedAuthority>>
public class KeycloakAuthenticationConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter<org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt,​java.util.Collection<org.springframework.security.core.GrantedAuthority>>
Convert the attribute of a JWT token into the corresponding java objects.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static java.lang.String DEFAULT_AUTHORITY_PREFIX
    Default user role authority prefix used by spring security
    private static java.lang.String WELL_KNOWN_AUTHORITY_CLAIM_NAME
    Keycloak use the claim name realm_access in the JWT token to transfer the authorities of the user
    private static java.lang.String WELL_KNOWN_AUTHORITY_KEY_NAME
    Keycloak use in the realm_access claim the key name roles to store the authorities of the user
    private static java.lang.String WELL_KNOWN_GROUP_CLAIM_NAME
    Keycloak use the claim name groups in the JWT token to transfer the groups of the user

    private java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getAuthorities​(org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt)
    Parse the user roles from the jwt token and transform them into a String collection.
    private java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getGroups​(org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt)
    Parse the user groups from the jwt token and transform them into a String collection.

  • Method Details

    • convert

      public java.util.Collection<org.springframework.security.core.GrantedAuthority> convert​(org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt)
      Converts the authorities in the JWT token to a GrantedAuthority collection.
      Specified by:
      convert in interface org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter<org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt,​java.util.Collection<org.springframework.security.core.GrantedAuthority>>
      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token object
      Returns:
      a GrantedAuthority collection containing all user roles and groups, if the user have any role or group;
      an empty GrantedAuthority collection otherwise;

    • getAuthorities

      private java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getAuthorities​(org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt)
      Parse the user roles from the jwt token and transform them into a String collection. Each pared role is prefixed with the DEFAULT_AUTHORITY_PREFIX to specify that this authority is a user role.
      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token object
      Returns:
      the parsed user roles, if the user have any role;
      a empty String collection;

    • getGroups

      private java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getGroups​(org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt)
      Parse the user groups from the jwt token and transform them into a String collection.
      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token object
      Returns:
      the parsed user groups, if the user have any group;
      a empty String collection otherwise;
